text: Hagi Ra Anumzamo'a vahe'mokizmi zamagesa eri hagaro hanige'za, hankavenentake ke'zanke'a nentahisnageno, zamavua eri hari hanige'za zamaheku'ma erisgama nehia azana nege'za, arimpa he'zamo'ma mika'za teno eri fanane nehia tevegna huno'ma ne-ea zane monagemo'ma tusiza nehigeno komopa komo'ma faragu vaziramino'ma eneramia zana kegahaze.
